revision.comment: mark as old, recat as old
revision.text:
{{menutrail|Main menu|Options menu|Display options|OpenGL options}} [[File:OpenGLPreferences.png|thumb|The OpenGL preferences menu in [[The Nadir]].]] The '''OpenGL preferences''' menu allowed to configure miscellaneous options of the [[OpenGL]] renderer. Its [[MENUDEF]] name was {{c|GLPrefOptions}}. It has been removed after its settings were merged in [[OpenGL options|its parent menu]].
[[Category:Documentation for removed featuresâ€Ž]]
